quotes.quote: A great marriage is not when the 'perfect couple' comes together. It is when an imperfect couple learns to enjoy their differences.
quotes.author: Dave Meurer

quotes.quote: Differences of habit and language are nothing at all if our aims are identical and our hearts are open.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Toward no crime have men shown themselves so cold-bloodedly cruel as in punishing differences of belief.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: If we cannot end now our differences, at least we can help make the world safe for diversity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: So, let us not be blind to our differences - but let us also direct attention to our common interests and to the means by which those differences can be resolved.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Honest differences are often a healthy sign of progress.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
